mapper.select: SELECT SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(odr_date, 'MM'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM'), odr_total_price)) FROM order_tbl WHERE odr_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2023-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TBL) *100) FROM ORDER_TBL WHERE ODR_STATUS='주문취소' GROUP BY ODR_STATUS
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TBL WHERE ODR_STATUS='주문완료'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TBL WHERE ODR_STATUS!='주문취소'
SELECT A.MOTH "MONTH", A.PRICE "PRICE" FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ODR_DATE,'MM') MOTH, SUM(ODR_TOTAL_PRICE) PRICE FROM ORDER_TBL GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ODR_DATE,'MM') ) A ORDER BY A.MOTH
